txt.en: The ruins among which the giants have made their encampments also house lost relics of the exiles from Erebor, who dwelt here once long ago.

'The ruins where the giants have settled were once part of the home Thrór established during his exile from the Lonely Mountain. These foul creatures have destroyed our halls, crushed our statues, and raided ancient tombs for relics of our past.

'The relics I spoke of hold many secrets that our kindred collected over many years, from our first fathers. They must be recovered, [placeholder].

'If you would, go to the giant encampments and bring back any relics you find there.'
The giant encampments may be found far to the south of Zudrugund.\n\nFrithgeir has asked you to recover a relic from the giants in Thrór's Coomb.
'This relic will be well-protected, as it is a symbol of our fathers. Each of the recovered relics is a small piece of our history reclaimed from Gunnberg and his giant rabble.'
The giant encampments may be found far to the south of Zudrugund.\n\nFrithgeir has asked you to recover a relic from the giants in Thrór's Coomb.
Frithgeir is at Zudrugund, north of the giant encampments.\n\nYou should bring the relic that you recovered to Frithgeir.
'The relics of our people must not be lost to the giants.'
'The relics of our people must not be lost to the giants.'
Defeat giants to recover a relic
